name: Hoverboard Heist (Butwhylevin)
description:
Created In 48 Hourst For The 2020 GMTK Game Jam!

Theme - "Out Of Control"

A simple physics-based game where you ride around on a hoverboard and try to reach the level exit as fast as you can. 

Controls - 

WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement

R - Restart Level

ESC - Back To Menu

Uses - 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/flat-style-vehicles-pack-free-90081

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/allsky-free-10-sky-skybox-set-146014
